column4: i dun understand why ubuntu finds updates for touchscreen when I dun have one :-s
is there linux version for chrome :-o ??
its available on google.com/chrome too .. i just saw

Chrome is the proprietary version, Chromium is open source. Slight differences, e.g. with Chromium from the repos, you'll get updates and such through Ubuntu's update manager, doesn't have Google branding
